Text: How the hell are you meant to get the subs in time?
And they're not just out of time the speed of them changes making them worthless, something to do with the FPS?

Lol, yeah. Apparently the timing is way off, the movie is spoken in German, and about 1/2 of all of the dialog is not subbed. I have found a decent Subtitle timing speed ratio (subtitle : video) for DirectVobSub. It is 1036 : 995. Took a bit of tweaking to get it to work properly, but it should do the trick... Whoever subtitled this thing needs to be beaten though.....
At around 56 min. or so into the movie, it should be changed to 1036 : 994......

"Whoever subtitled this thing needs to be beaten though....."

LMAO, True. It's possible the subs are for another copy, I have 2 copies of this film now, this one and another in Russian which is dubbed directly over the bloody english words so it's amuddle!

I'll try your idea. After I see this I will have seen all of Jet Li's films so I need to see it! :P

The Chinese national wushu team has two exceptional members Jimmy and 
Tiger . They are in L.A to perform exhibitions. Tiger wants to defect 
to L.A. to make a big name for himself but when Jimmy learns his 
frind's plan to defect, an attempt to stop him fails and Jimmy ends up 
missing his flight to China. Jimmy's only hope is Andy, who is a 
wisecracking youngster in Los Angeles. Meanwhile, Tiger works for a 
mafia boss. When Tiger loses a fortune in cocaine in a detergent box 
that Andy accidentally took, Andy and Jimmy soon have no choice but to 
face the wrath of Tiger and his men. Their only ally is Penny, the 
girlfriend of Tiger's boss but the two men who were once best friends 
have now become bitter enemies...For more information go to 
wing-chunws/Dragon%20Fight.html
